sources.title: Redhead (1941) Comedy, Romance Full Length Movie
sources.description:
"PAY ME, DADDY..-and take it from baby, you're getting off cheap!" * Falling in love with Redhead, is like falling around with a buzz saw...you're sure to get hurt!  A young playboy and a girl marry because they think the boy's rich father will pay the girl $20,000 to divorce his son, and they will then split the money. 
 
Director: Edward L. Cahn
Writers: Vera Brown  Conrad Seiler 
Stars: June Lang, Johnny Downs, Eric Blore 
Genres: Comedy,Romance

CCC CHAPTERS: in the general comments tell us your favorite scene and we will add it

metadata.Plot: A young playboy and a girl marry because they think the boy's rich father will pay the girl $20,000 to divorce his son, and they will then split the money. Instead, the father works out a deal with the girl in which she will not only stay married to him, but try to reform him.
metadata.Writer: Vera Brown, Conrad Seiler, Dorothy Davenport
metadata.Actors: June Lang, Johnny Downs, Eric Blore
